sentences.sentence: So there must be complicated relations between the above two. Taking paten …

sentences.sentence: Paten Wireless has positioned itself not only as a manufacturer, but also as a service provider.

sentences.sentence: Introduce the information characteristic of patent, and introduce the background and the concrete paten analysis method that base on this basis.
